author: chirino
msg: Added better slave synchronization handling on the master side.  We now create a snapshot for each slave session and clean up the snapshot once the slave is online.

msg: GERONIMO-3316 Enhance manifest classpath processing to be more permissive if -DXorg.apache.geronimo.deployment.LenientMFCP=true is specified in JAVA_OPTS

author: jim
msg: *) mod_proxy: Prevent segmentation faults by correctly adjusting the lifetime
